description: From Middle English insomuche; equivalent to in +‎ so +‎ much.

entries.meaning: Because of; since; as a result of.
examples: Insomuch as you have consistently paid the bill on time before, we'll excuse one late payment.
These weights did not exert their natural gravity  […]  insomuch that I could not guess which was light or heavy whilst I held them in my hand.
